feed.title: SAP Community - SAP ERP
feed.subtitle: SAP ERP Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: FX evaluation
entry.content:
Hi,

I'm looking for clarification on how ledger setup impacts foreign exchange evaluation in S/4HANA Cloud (3SL). Our customer prefers the classic method for FX revaluation, which typically aligns with ledger 0L. However, the implementation partner has activated ledger 4G to support advanced FX evaluation features.

Is it feasible to run classic FX evaluation on 0L while leveraging 4G for the advanced version? The partner believes this dual setup might satisfy both preferences, but weâ€™d like to confirm whether such a configuration is technically supported.

Any insights would be greatly appreciated.

Jack

entry.title: cannot enter to PI Sheet(Loading data)
entry.content:
hello , expert

I have an issue to load PI sheet through CO60

I can access up to CO60, but after selecting the PI sheet and clicking on Display/Maintenance, it stays stuck on " loading data" as shown in the attached image. The log data indicates that the data was loaded successfully, but as you can see, it remains like this. 

How can i resolve this issue?

entry.title: Service Notification Task Long Text Timestamps
entry.content: How do I implement Service Notification Task Long Text timestamp/user information (Control Text) without locking out the Service Notification Long Text after a save state on the notification? Currently, I have a need to ingest data from the Service Notification Task Long Text through an integration with timestamp/user information from SAP. However, when I had implemented the Service Notification Control Text to support this need, end users were negatively impacted by the Service Notification Long Text becoming un-editable after inducing a save state on the Service Notification in IW52.

entry.title: When lowercase letters are entered as input in CONVERSION_EXIT_CUNIT_INPUT, no results appear.
entry.content:
When lowercase letters are entered as input in CONVERSION_EXIT_CUNIT_INPUT, no results appear.

Comocial unit(MSEH3) is 'kPU'.

Internal unit(MSEHI) is 'KPU'.

CALL FUNCTION 'CONVERSION_EXIT_CUNIT_INPUT'
EXPORTING
input = 'kPU'
language = sy-langu
IMPORTING
output = output_unit
EXCEPTIONS
unit_not_found = 1
OTHERS = 2.

When performing the above function, the output_unit has no value.

When debuging it, it seems that the input 'kPU' is being changed to ' KPU' when searching. Is this a bug?

The domain (MSEH3) is set to be case-sensitive.

entry.title: Mails nicht in der Warteschlange ; Status SO672
entry.content:
Mails in SOST werden sporadisch nicht in die Warteschlange gestellt und bekommen den Status SO672.

Betroffen sind ca 10% der ausgehenden Mails (externes Senden) , 90% , welche auf dem selben Weg erstellt werden, werden problemlos versendet.

Was kann die Ursache sein ?

Gibt es einen Report, der die Selektion von Mails , die zB seit 15 Minuten im Status Wartend ohne Eintrag in die Warteschlange sind und diese dann per "Senden wiederholen" in die Warteschlange stellt. Wenn nicht: Welche Tabellen mÃ¼ssen fÃ¼r die Selektion genutzt werden ?

entry.title: Reviewer Access for personal Information in EC
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

We are facing an issue related to permissions. Is it possible to view changes in the same portlet during the approval through workflow without granting edit permission for the personal information section.

entry.title: SAP GUI 7.70 â€“ Cannot Record Script or Capture Controls in PI Sheet
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

Iâ€™m currently using SAP GUI for Windows 7.70 (Patch Level 7) on Windows 11 Enterprise 23H2 (Build 22631).
The scripting function works normally for most transactions â€” I can record scripts and get control IDs without any issue.

However, when I open a PI Sheet, the Script Recording and Playback feature produces a blank script.
No actions or controls are recorded, even though the same feature works fine in other transactions.

Interestingly, I used to record scripts in PI Sheet successfully with an older setup (probably the same GUI version but different patch level).
That means the system and authorization are fine â€” only the PI Sheet scripting interface seems broken now.

Hereâ€™s what Iâ€™ve already checked:

  • âœ… Client-side scripting is enabled (Options > Accessibility & Scripting > Enable Scripting)

  • âœ… Server-side parameter sapgui/user_scripting = TRUE

  • ğŸ–¥ï¸ Other SAP transactions (like ME21N, CO03, etc.) can be recorded without any problem

  • âš ï¸ Only PI Sheet fails to generate any script output

My question is:
ğŸ‘‰ Is this a known limitation or bug in certain SAP GUI 7.70 patch levels?
ğŸ‘‰ Which patch level or configuration allows PI Sheet scripting again?
ğŸ‘‰ Do I need to downgrade or upgrade the GUI (e.g., Patch Level 15 or GUI 8.00)?

Any advice or workaround would be greatly appreciated!
Thank you very much in advance.

Best regards,
Sosan

entry.title: How to update â€œDisplay-onlyâ€ material master fields (Gross/Net Weight) via MM17 or IDoc in S/4HANA?
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I am working in S/4HANA and I have a scenario with material master fields MARA-BRGEW (Gross Weight) and MARA-NTGEW (Net Weight).

  • In MM02, these fields are set to Display only via field selection (OMS9/OMS2).

  • I want to update these fields via MM17 (mass maintenance) or MATMAS IDoc.

  • Currently, SAP blocks the change and returns MG140: â€œField not ready for inputâ€.

I understand that SAP marks these fields as non-dialog in the backend, so the â€œDisplay onlyâ€ status does not allow updates through direct input or IDocs.

My question:
Is there a standard / S/4HANA-supported way to update these display-only fields programmatically (via IDoc, MM17, or API), without changing the MM02 screen status?

entry.title: Career Advice: Choosing Between SAP Ariba, EWM, and PP
entry.content:
Hello, 

Iâ€™m an Industrial Engineer with no prior work experience, but I speak four languages â€” English, German, Turkish, and Arabic. Iâ€™ve recently completed hands-on training in SAP MM and am now planning to learn another SAP module to strengthen my career path.

My goal is to build a strong professional profile and find good job opportunities in the Gulf region, where SAP is in high demand. I want to choose a module that aligns with my industrial engineering background, complements my SAP MM knowledge, leverages my language skills, and offers long-term career stability â€” even with the growing impact of AI and automation.

Currently, Iâ€™m considering 1) SAP Ariba(e.g., Procurement, Supplier Management, Sourcing ..) and 2) SAP EWM. I am also thinking about SAP PP, but I believe its opportunities are limited, as it is mostly confined to the industrial sector. Additionally, I would like advice on whether to focus on Cloud Private Edition or On-Premise for SAP MM and the next module.

Which module and deployment type would you recommend to help me stay competitive and future-proof my career in the Gulf market?

Thank you very much for your advice!

entry.title: Error stop occurred during SAP package import (tcode: SPAM) at AUTO_MOD_SPAU phase.
entry.content:
An error stop occurred during the package import process in SAP (transaction code: SPAM) at the AUTO_MOD_SPAU phase.

 

- Env.

SPAM 7.40/0081

 

- Target Components and Versions

SAP_BASIS: SAPKB74029 â†’ SAPKB74030

SAP_GWFND: SAPK-74029INSAPGWFND â†’ SAPK-74030INSAPGWFND

 

SPAM status: Error stop

Import Phase: AUTO_MOD_SPAU

 

During the import process to version 74030, a Runtime Error: DBSQL_INTERNAL_ERROR occurred.

I retried the import using the â€œIgnore General Errorâ€ option, but it stopped again at the same point.

 

The displayed message is as follows:

The termination occurred in the ABAP program "SAPRUPGM", in the routine "SELECT_DELETED_OBJECTS".
The main program was "SAPRUPRM".

entry.title: How to Print Multiple FB01 Customer Invoices as PDF in SAP ERP?
entry.content:
Hi everyone,
 
in our accounting department, we often post customer invoices manually using transaction FB01. After posting, these documents need to be printed or saved as PDF invoices.
 
Currently, the only way we know is quite cumbersome:
 
Go to FBL5N,
 
Select the relevant documents (set the checkboxes),
 
Choose Environment â†’ Correspondence â†’ Request,
 
Then again Environment â†’ Correspondence â†’ Display,
 
and finally print the PDF.
 
This process works, but itâ€™s far from efficient when dealing with multiple invoices.
 
Question:
Is there a standard SAP transaction or report that allows printing multiple accounting documents (FB01) as PDFs in one go â€” for example, by providing a list of document numbers as input?
 
Or would this typically require a custom ABAP solution (e.g., a Z-report calling the print program with a specific correspondence type)?
 
Any advice or experience with this use case would be greatly appreciated!

entry.title: Verification of Payee (VoP)
entry.content:
Dear SAP, 

We would like to set up Verification of Payee  (VoP) in our SAP system ECC6.
Could you confirm whether you will also implement that for ECC6 please.

Do not hesitate to get back to me if you nedd more explanation.

Thank you.

Kind Regards

entry.title: T5UTKZ VA Marital Status Entry
entry.content:
Hi Support,

The BSI Marital Status grid does not include a marital status for Virginia (VA). However, in SAP table T5UTKZ, there is an incorrect entry for VA-marital status code 15: Married, Withhold at Single Rate. This entry should be removed, as VA does not define filing status on Form VA-4.

entry.title: Double GR Posting- Locking Issue
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I am facing this issue recently, we have the control key as PP02(Auto GR), While completing the last operation in DM   yield is posted and then goods receipt is automatically posted. So when order Qty is 2, GR  Qty is 2 obviously.

But in some situations while DM posting the last operation locking issue occurs, causing the posting to occur in COGI. When we reprocess the COGI entry, another 101 movement is also triggered.

As a result, Order Qty is 2, GR posting is 4 -> 2Qty (MB31-AutoGR) and Second GR - 2QTY COGI.

Pls suggest me configuration changes which can be made to stop this issue.

entry.title: Fehlermeldung 06268 Mehrfachkontierung nicht erlaubt
entry.content:
Hallo SAP Spezialisten, ich habe den Fehler "06268 Mehrfachkontierung nicht erlaubt" nach einen SP Update erhalten. Daraufhin habe ich das Customizing angepasst von Verbrauchsbuchung P auf V, wie im Hinweis 1889731 beschrieben. Nun habe ich im System allerdings noch alte Bestellungen mit den "alten" Customizing und wenn ich diese anpassen oder Ã¤ndern will, dann erhalte ich dennoch die Meldung 06268.

Ich kann die Bestellposition lÃ¶schen und eine neue anlegen, sofern keine Buchungen (Anzahlung, Teilrechnung,...) stattgefunden haben. 

Wenn ich allerdings eine Buchung auf der Bestellposition habe, dann kann ich keine Ã„nderungen am Preis, PositionstextergÃ¤nzung, Pflege AuftragsbestÃ¤tigung, Lieferterminanpassung machen. Gibt es eine MÃ¶glichkeit dieses Problem zu lÃ¶sen?

Beste GrÃ¼ÃŸe CR02

entry.title: Balance Carryforward - S/4 Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I'm currently facing an issue in the context of a support project on SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Edition. The client has requested a custom field in the balance sheet to display consolidation adjustments by company code. However, during the balance carryforward process, the values in this custom field are not being transferred into the opening balance of the next fiscal year.

Do you know if this is standard behavior for custom fields in the Public Cloud Edition, or could it be related to a configuration setting?

Any insights or suggestions would be greatly appreciated.

entry.title: F107 - FINS_FI_CLS023 - Advanced valuation active; you can no longer use the old report
entry.content:
Hi everyone:

I'm in a SAP S/4HANA 2023 project and we have activated "advance valuation". But the thing is that "Perform Further Valuations" app and  F107 Valuation Run is working no more, and now shows this message:

------

Message No. FINS_FI_CLS023

Diagnosis

You tried to execute a closing job that is no longer supported. You have activated the new closing processes. That is why you can no longer run the classic valuations.

System Response

The system does not execute the job.

Procedure

You activate advanced valuation for the accounting principle and the company code in the activity Activate Advanced Valuation.

For more information, please read the documentation of the activity Activate Advanced Valuation.

------

Does anyone know which is the new transaction that replaces F107 and the new Fiori app that replaces Perform Further Valuations?

Best regards
